alert.note: Alert for Bennett County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Pine Ridge Area; Tripp County (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 30 at 1:50PM MST until January 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 326, 333, 334, AND 335 ACROSS SOUTHERN SOUTH DAKOTA... .Very warm, windy and dry conditions are expected across southern portions of South Dakota Monday afternoon, as a strong cold front moves through the Northern Plains. Critical fire weather conditions will be possible. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 326, 333, 334, AND 335... The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 326 Pine Ridge Area, 333 Bennett County Area, 334 Mellette and Todd Counties and 335 Tripp County. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bennett County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Pine Ridge Area; Tripp County
